# Rate Limiting Problems

Request throttling algorithms.

## Problems

| ID | Name | Description |
|----|------|-------------|
| rl001 | Token Bucket | Token bucket limiter |
| rl002 | Sliding Window | Sliding window counter |
| rl003 | Leaky Bucket | Leaky bucket queue |
| rl004 | Fixed Window | Fixed window counter |
| rl005 | Concurrent Limiter | Concurrency limit |
| rl006 | Adaptive Limiter | Adaptive rate |
| rl007 | Burst Limiter | Burst allowance |
| rl008 | Quota Limiter | Quota management |
